channel.title: Green Crowns
channel.description:
Is there a way to add a new type of crown? My server, slomiscape, is getting increasly popular, and with that comes the rich, and the high lvl real RS players. They are willing to pay large ammounts to become mods and admins. I thought it would be nice to give them their own, green crown. (Like the silver mod one, or gold admin one, just green for payers)
Is this possible, and if it is, can someone post a TuT for it?
Thx

item.title: Green Crowns
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Has jagex it?
No they dont lol

Read full topic

Are you sure? Is there another way to signify that they are “different”?
